section.name: Quickstart Guide to SOD
section.p: This is a quick guide to getting an initial run of SOD. More details are in the full documentation for install, run, etc.
SOD is written in Java, and so you must have Java version 1.4 or better installed in order to use SOD. Java can be downloaded for Windows and Solaris at http://java.sun.com/j2se.

At this point SOD should begin running, then downloading data from the DMC in Seattle. The output should look like this:
[roo:sod-2.0] crotwell$ bin/sod.sh -f examples/tutorial.xml 16 [main] INFO edu.sc.seis.sod.Start - Valid config file OpenMap(tm) Version 4.6 Copyright (C) BBNT Solutions LLC. All rights reserved. See http://openmap.bbn.com/ for details.
FIJI ISLANDS REGION Lat: -20.6 Lon: -177.7 01/04/2003 05:15:03 6.0 MB 378.0 km LUZON, PHILIPPINES Lat: 15.7 Lon: 119.7 01/06/2003 23:43:50 5.5 MB 10.0 km CHILE-ARGENTINA BORDER REGION Lat: -33.8 Lon: -70.1 01/07/2003 00:54:51 6.0 MB 110.8 km Got 1 seismograms for II.COCO.00.LH1 for event in FIJI ISLANDS REGION at 2003-01-04T05:15:03.840Z Got 1 seismograms for II.COCO.00.LH2 for event in FIJI ISLANDS REGION at 2003-01-04T05:15:03.840Z Got 1 seismograms for II.COCO.00.LHZ for event in FIJI ISLANDS REGION at 2003-01-04T05:15:03.840Z Got 1 seismograms for II.ERM.00.LHE for event in FIJI ISLANDS REGION at 2003-01-04T05:15:03.840Z Got 1 seismograms for II.ERM.00.LHN for event in FIJI ISLANDS REGION at 2003-01-04T05:15:03.840Z Got 1 seismograms for II.ERM.00.LHZ for event in FIJI ISLANDS REGION at 2003-01-04T05:15:03.840Z ...

The status directory will contain html files, which will be updated about every 2 minutes or so, showing the events, stations, and seismograms that have been found. The POND_II directory will contain subdirectories for each earthquake retrieved by SOD. Each of these subdirectories will contain SAC files corresponding to that earthquake, along with dsml files that are readable by GEE.
